about_the_game:
Are you ready for an endless adventure? In Shadows Behind, you embark on a challenging journey as a knight searching for magical orbs. These orbs are crucial for protecting your kingdom. However, throughout your journey, you are being pursued by your own dark shadow versions.

Gameplay:

Orb Collection: Every magical orb you encounter along the way rewards you with points. Collect these orbs to achieve high scores.
Avoiding Shadows: Your shadows track every step you take and develop various strategies to capture you. You need to stay clear of these shadows while overcoming obstacles and avoiding rapidly moving dangers.
Challenging Obstacles: You will face various obstacles during your journey. These obstacles test your reflexes and strategic thinking. You must navigate around these obstacles while avoiding the shadows.
Tips for Success:

Strategy and Reflexes: Be careful with every move and adjust your strategy accordingly. To survive among rapidly moving dangers and shadows, you need to think quickly and make the right moves.
